QuestData.Title: Diffractory Chromascope
QuestData.Description: To properly identify this artifact, I will need tools for analysis. A diffractory chromascope should suffice, I think.$b$bI already have the mithril casing, which surprisingly, is the hardest part to find. We simply need two other pieces: a ruby and a sapphire.$b$bThere's pirates nearby, just to our south, and a bit farther to the east. Pirates love treasure... why don't you see if you can find some gems for me?
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain a Bloodsail Ruby and a Bloodsail Sapphire.
QuestData.CompletionText: <Flem's eyes sparkle.>$b$bAre those gems I see?
QuestData.RewardText: <Flem weighs the gems in his hands and nods in approval.>$b$bYes, these will do. Now to perform the analysis...$b$b<The goblin clacks the gems together for a while, then looks up at you.>$b$bOh, you're still here? You don't think I'm a fraud or something, do you?
